contentrichtext.text: [[File:Caffè corretto.jpg|thumb|260px|Caffè correttos]] {{Italian cuisine}} '''Caffè corretto''', an [[Italy|Italian]] [[Drink|beverage]], consists of a shot of [[espresso]] with a shot of [[Alcoholic beverage|liquor]],<ref>{{Cite book |last1=Simonis |first1=Damien |last2=Garwood |first2=Duncan |title=Italy |publisher=Lonely Planet |year=2004 |page=72 |url=http://books.google.com/books?id=Y63EqiXTHywC&pg=PA72 |isbn=978-1-74104-080-7}}</ref> usually [[grappa]], and sometimes [[sambuca]]<ref>{{Cite book |last=Steves |first=Rick |title=Rick Steves' Italy 2007 |publisher=Avalon Travel |year=2006 |page=40 http://books.google.com/books?id=krCIh7ED1YUC&pg=PA40 |isbn=978-1-56691-816-9}}</ref> or [[brandy]].<ref>{{Cite book |last=Riely |first=Elizabeth |title=The chef's companion: a culinary dictionary |publisher=John Wiley and Sons |year=2003 |page=49 |url=http://books.google.com/books?id=rDZuBx_-hi8C&pg=PA49 |isbn=978-0-471-39842-4}}</ref> It is also known (outside of Italy) as an "espresso corretto". It is ordered as "un caffè corretto alla [[grappa]]," "[…] corretto alla [[sambuca]]," or "[…] corretto al [[Cognac (drink)|cognac]]," depending on the desired liquor. The Italian word 'corretto' corresponds to the English word 'correct' in the sense of 'proper'. The term is now an Italian [[Phraseme]].<ref name = "reverso">{{Cite web|url= http://dictionary.reverso.net/italian-english/corretto|title=definition of corretto| English-Italian Definition Dictionary | Reverso|publisher=Dictionary.reverso.net |date=|accessdate=2012-02-27}}</ref> In [[Spain]], a similar drink is known as [[carajillo]], and in [[Sweden]] and [[Norway]] as [[kaffekask]] and [[karsk]], (although "karsk" is in fact coffee added to [[moonshine]] to make the moonshine palatable, rather than liquor added to coffee for flavor) respectively.<ref>{{Cite book |last=Johansson Robinowitz |first=Christina |authorlink= |coauthors=Lisa Werner Carr |title=Modern-day Vikings: a practical guide to interacting with the Swedes |publisher=Intercultural Press |year=2001 |location= |page=149 |url=http://books.google.com/books?id=MAn641nHfrYC&pg=PA149 |doi= |id= |isbn=978-1-877864-88-9}}</ref> ==References== {{reflist}} == See also == *[[Irish coffee]] *[[Liqueur coffee]] * {{portal-inline|Coffee}} {{coffee|nocat=1}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Caffe corretto}} [[Category:Italian beverages]] [[Category:Alcoholic coffee beverages]] {{coffee-stub}} {{italy-cuisine-stub}} [[it:Caffè espresso#Caffè corretto]]
